mapper.insert:
insert into expedia_important_info (hotel_id, fee_mandatory, fee_optional, instructions_en, instructions, know_before_you_go_en, know_before_you_go) values
(#{item.hotelId},#{item.feeMandatory},#{item.feeOptional},#{item.instructionsEn},#{item.instructions} ,#{item.knowBeforeYouGoEn},#{item.knowBeforeYouGo})
